sentences.english: You can sublet or live by your own.
sentences.chinese: 你可以選擇分租或自住。

sentences.english: Party B will not transfer the lease of the premises or sub without Party A's approval.
sentences.chinese: 未經甲方同意，乙方不得將承租的房屋轉租或分租。

sentences.english: The disadvantage of sharing an apartment is the lack of privacy.
sentences.chinese: 一起分租公寓的缺點就是缺乏隱私。

sentences.english: They sublease a small office in the centre of town.
sentences.chinese: 他們從市中心分租了一個小辦公室。
